comments:
Build ID: I20070323-1616

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Fresh install of Eclipse 3.3/CDT 4.0M6
2. Open Product Configuration via Help/Software Updates/Manage Configuration
3. Expand tree and Show Properties of any component
4. Attempt to close via "Ok," "Cancel," or close window

Expected result:
Window closes

Actual result:
OK button becomes greyed out, error message displayed.
Properties text shows "Unknown element selected."
Must terminate Eclipse via the Task Manager to recover.


More information:

java.version=1.6.0_01
java.vendor=Sun Microsystems Inc.

Eric, to find out which page is causing your problem you can go to the Plug-in Registry View (Window>Show View>Other...) and expand org.eclipse.ui>Extension Points>org.eclipse.ui.propertyPages ... you are looking for a <page> with an <enabledWhen> clause that contains a <test> element with a property that ends with "toolEditEnabled"
